text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali held talks with Mauritanian President Maaouya Ould Sid'Ahmed Taya on ways to speed up Arab Maghreb Union.
- President Ben Ali instructed Prime Minister Hamed Karoui to implement the accords signed at the fifth meeting of the Tunisian-Egyptian high commission held in Tunis last week.
- Mauritanian President ended a three-day official visit to Tunisia in which he aimed at boosting bilateral cooperation.
- Libyan leader Colonel Muammar Gaddafi pays hommage to President Ben Ali.
- President Ben Ali conferred with Prime Minister Hamed Karoui on strategy to develop Tunisian airliners.
